clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Neosil on Chronic Effluvium
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized Clinical Trial, Placebo Controlled and Active Comparator, to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of Neosil in Chronic Effluvium

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of Neosil in the treatment of chronic effluvium

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of adverse events recorded during the study

arm_group.description: The patient will take the tablets, as follow: 3 tablets of Neosil, Oral, per day - during the initial 12 weeks; and 2 tablets of Neosil Oral, per day - during the last 12 weeks.
The patient wil take the tablets, as follow: 3 tablets of Placebo, Oral, per day - during the initial 12 weeks; and 3 tablets of Pantogar, Oral, per day - during the last 12 weeks.
The patient will take the tablets, as follow: 2 tablets of Neosil Oral, per day - during the 12 weeks.

intervention.description: Oral, placebo for 12 weeks and pantogar for 12 weeks.
